scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Marsha
scrape.text: This wasn't a horribly written book and maybe it's because it is translated or by a foreign author, but I feel like what was missing was a hero/heroine. Where was the person that I could relate to? Identify with? like? Truth be told- I didn't finish, because it was too dark and the rest of my bookclub said it got worse not better in darkness. I wanted someone to root for.
